site.name: Pooja Tours and Travels
site.whatsappText: Hi! I'd like to book a cab with Pooja Tours and Travels. Please share availability.

hero.description: Looking for a reliable and comfortable cab for outstation, airport transfers, or local rides across Maharashtra, Gujarat, Rajasthan & beyond? Pooja Tours and Travels is your trusted partner for every journey.

features.title: 24/7 Service
features.desc: We understand that your travel needs may arise at any time. We are available round the clock, every day of the year.

features.title: Hassle-Free Rides
features.desc: Sit back, relax, and let us handle the journey. Clean cars, professional drivers, zero stress.

features.title: Easy Booking
features.desc: Booking a Pooja Tours cab is a breeze! One call or WhatsApp message and your ride is confirmed.

fleet.name: Sedan
features: Toyota Etios / Maruti Dzire / Hyundai Xcent
fleet.description: Our sedan fleet offers perfect comfort for intercity travel and airport runs. Choose from Toyota Etios, Maruti Dzire, or Hyundai Xcent for a smooth and affordable ride.

fleet.name: Ertiga
fleet.description: The Maruti Ertiga is the perfect mid-size MPV for small groups and families. Spacious, fuel-efficient, and comfortable for both city and outstation trips.

fleet.name: Innova
fleet.description: The Toyota Innova remains India's most trusted family SUV. Ideal for long-distance outstation trips, airport transfers, and corporate travel across Maharashtra and Gujarat.

fleet.name: Innova Crysta
fleet.description: Travel in luxury with the Toyota Innova Crysta. Premium seating, powerful engine, and superior comfort make it the top choice for special occasions, business tours, and premium outstation trips.

fleet.name: Tempo Traveller
fleet.description: Planning a group trip, pilgrimage, corporate outing, or wedding procession? Our Tempo Traveller handles large groups with ease, ensuring comfort across long distances.

services.title: Airport Transfers
services.desc: Reliable and punctual pickups & drops to all major airports. Pune, Mumbai, Ahmedabad, Bangalore, Hyderabad ‚Äì we've got you covered.

services.title: Outstation Trips
services.desc: MH ¬∑ GJ ¬∑ RJ ¬∑ MP ¬∑ Hyderabad ¬∑ Bangalore ‚Äî We operate across all major outstation routes with experienced local drivers.

services.title: One Way / Round Trip
services.desc: Whether it's a one-way drop or a multi-day round trip, we have flexible packages to suit your travel plan and budget.

services.title: Hourly Rentals
services.desc: Need a cab for a few hours? Our hourly rental packages give you full flexibility for local errands, meetings, and city tours.

coverage.title: We Cover All of
coverage.subtitle: Maharashtra ¬∑ Gujarat ¬∑ Rajasthan ¬∑ Madhya Pradesh ¬∑ Hyderabad ¬∑ Bangalore

about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: Your Trusted Travel Partner Across Western India
about.description: At Pooja Tours and Travels, we take pride in being your reliable and dedicated cab service operating from Pune. With years of experience and a passion for seamless travel, we connect Maharashtra, Gujarat, Rajasthan, and beyond ‚Äî one comfortable journey at a time.
about.story: Pooja Tours and Travels was founded with a simple mission: to make outstation travel stress-free, safe, and affordable. Starting in Pune, we have grown to serve thousands of happy customers across Western and Central India.

whyChoose.title: Expert Route Knowledge
whyChoose.desc: Our drivers know every major route between Pune, Mumbai, Ahmedabad, Surat, Indore, and beyond ‚Äî ensuring fast and safe journeys.

whyChoose.title: Safety First
whyChoose.desc: All vehicles are well-maintained and regularly serviced. Drivers are verified, trained, and courteous professionals.

whyChoose.title: Flexible Fleet
whyChoose.desc: From economical sedans to premium Innova Crysta and group Tempo Travellers ‚Äî pick what suits your group and budget.

whyChoose.title: 24/7 Availability
whyChoose.desc: Early morning flights or late-night arrivals ‚Äî we are always available. Book anytime, travel anytime.

whyChoose.title: Transparent Pricing
whyChoose.desc: No hidden charges, no surprises. You'll know the full fare before your journey begins.

testimonials.name: Sneha Patel
testimonials.text: Excellent service! Booked a Pune‚ÄìMumbai cab on short notice and the driver arrived early. The car was spotless and the ride was smooth. Highly recommend Pooja Tours for any outstation trip!

testimonials.name: Rahul Sharma
testimonials.text: Used their Mumbai‚ÄìAhmedabad cab service for a family trip. Innova Crysta was perfect ‚Äî spotless, AC, and the driver was very professional. Will definitely book again.

testimonials.name: Priya Mehta
testimonials.text: We booked a Tempo Traveller for our group of 12 for a Pune temple tour. The vehicle was well-maintained and the driver was brilliant. Will be recommending Pooja Tours to everyone!

testimonials.name: Amit Joshi
testimonials.text: I use Pooja Tours for my Mumbai airport transfers regularly. Always on time, always comfortable, always the best price. 5 stars without hesitation.

cta.title: Ready to experience the best cab service from Pune & Mumbai?

footer.description: Your trusted partner for outstation, airport, and local cab services across Maharashtra, Gujarat, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Hyderabad, and Bangalore.
